body: This looks pretty godly hopefully one day they translate it, and am I the only one that wish there was some notification system on this site for when people tag you or for when something new is released from your favorite artist, because I hate having to check every time I want to see if anything new has dropped.

Plot twist:the tattoo man doesn't help the woman to cope with their trauma, instead he paints onto them his artworks to later flay them. Explaining they we only see on the pages 176-177 the artwork from the back skin and not anymore whole person.
Looks kinda wholesome. A guy tattoo womans body to cover whatever behind it.
This is not hentai...This is art
hmm , this looks interesting. will wait for this one to get translated
